Quote: I practice hard every day with Toph and Katara. I've been training my arrow off!
Should we just head west until we reach the Fire Lord's house? Knock, knock. Hello, Fire Lord? Anybody home? I don't think so.
I don't see anything wrong with having one of those fruity beverages while we plan our strategy.
Now tell me- what was the primary agricultural product of your people?
You spent years walking through the desert to find some guy's library?
Wan Shi Tong and his knowledge seekers collected books from all over the world, and put them on display for mankind to read, so that we might better ourselves.
I'd like to spend my vacation at the library!
You gotta work here a little longer before you qualify for vacation time.
I've made several trips into the Si Wong Desert and almost died each time.
Tell me, sky bison, are you the last of your breed? Delightful! I only wish I spoke his tongue. Oh, the stories this beast could tell.
There it is! That's what it will sound like when one of you spots it.
I've held books before. And I gotta tell you, they don't exactly do it for me.
You should leave the way you came. Unless you want to become a stuffed head of anthropology.
I am Wan Shi Tong, 'He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things.' And you are obviously humans, which, by the way, are no longer permitted in my study.
Humans only bother learning things to get the edge on other humans. Like that firebender who came to this place a few years ago, looking to destroy his enemy. So ... who are you trying to destroy?
If you're going to lie to an all-knowing spirit being, you should at least put some effort into it.
You're not very bright, are you?
So ... you like ... flying?
Aang, did you know in a past life, you were left-handed?
That's so unfair! Just when I think I'm one step ahead of the Fire Nation, it turns out they beat us here a long time ago.
Shh, Katara, not in front of the fox, he's with the owl
Mortals are so predictable, and such terrible liars. You betrayed my trust. From the beginning, you intended to misuse this knowledge for evil purposes.
You don't understand. If anyone's evil, it's the Fire Nation. You saw what they did to your library. They're destructive and dangerous.
You think you're the first person to believe their war was justified? Countless others before you have come here seeking weapons or weaknesses or battle strategies.
Great Knowledge Spirit, I beg you, do not destroy your vast collection of priceless tomes.
Your waterbending won't do you much good here. I've studied Northern water style, Southern water style, even Foggy Swamp style
I'm not leaving. I can't. I've spent too long trying to find this place. There's not another collection of knowledge like this on earth. I could spend an eternity in here.
